name: Sharp Trouble
description:
Sharp trouble - King, wake up, we're under attack! Evil barbarians have invaded your castle and are trying to take out the entire treasury - stop this outrage in this hardcore platformer! Beware of insidious archers and their deadly arrows, bottomless abysses and sharp spikes that miss the taste of blood. Collect every single coin to regain your fortune and not lose your crown on the way to the last level of this exciting adventure!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
